parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. Example: `2024-08-06 10:15:00`.

parameters.name: Length
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

Default value: 1000.

>  The maximum value of the Length parameter in a request is 1440.

parameters.name: MetricName
parameters.description: The metric that you want to use. For more information, see [CloudMonitor metrics](https://cms.console.aliyun.com/metric-meta/acs_ecs_dashboard/ecs).

parameters.name: Period
parameters.description:
The statistical period of the monitoring data.

Set the value to 60 or an integer multiple of 60.

Unit: seconds.

Default value: 60.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Example: `2024-08-06 10:05:00`.
